function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased and ongoing energy consumption in residential buildings","Impact":"Failure of energy supply leading to discomfort and inconvenience for occupants","Mitigation":"Developing a backup energy source for emergency situations","Technologies":"Backup energy systems, energy storage systems","People":"Residential building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, property managers"},{"Description":"Increased consumption of nonrenewable energy","Impact":"Environmental and sustainability issues","Mitigation":"Promoting the use of sustainable renewable energy sources for constant energy supply","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Government, building owners, developers"},{"Description":"Use of energy-inefficient appliances","Impact":"Higher energy consumption and cost for household activities","Mitigation":"Promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and appliances","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, smart home technologies","People":"Household residents","Owner":"Household owners, manufacturers"}]}
